verses.roman:
anna-vyañjana-pūrṇa dekhi' sakala bhājane
dekhiyā saṁśaya haila kichu camatkāra mane

synonyms: anna-vyañjana-pūrṇa—filled with rice and vegetables; dekhi'-seeing; sakala bhājane—all the cooking pots; dekhiyā—seeing; saṁśaya haila—there was doubt; kichu—some; camatkāra—wonder; mane—in the mind.
translation: "When she saw that all the pots were still filled with rice and vegetables, there was some doubt in her mind, and she was astonished.
